00051 typedef struct tNatLangInfo {

00079 static void NLChangeDialog(HINSTANCE hInst, HWND hNpp, HWND hWnd, LPCTSTR pszSection)
00080 {
00081         TCHAR           szPath[MAX_PATH];
00082         ::GetModuleFileName((HMODULE)hInst, szPath, MAX_PATH);
00083 
00084         tNatLangInfo            nli;
00085         nli.hCtrl                       = hWnd;
00086         nli.pszCtrl                     = pszSection;
00087 
00088         CommunicationInfo       ci;
00089         ci.srcModuleName        = PathFindFileName(szPath);
00090         ci.internalMsg          = NPP_NATLANG_CHANGEDLG;
00091         ci.info                         = &nli;
00092         ::SendMessage(hNpp, NPPM_MSGTOPLUGIN, (WPARAM)NATIVE_LANG_NAME, (LPARAM)&ci);
00093 }
00094 
00115 static void NLChangeNppMenu(HINSTANCE hInst, HWND hNpp, LPCTSTR pszPluginName, FuncItem* funcItem, UINT nbFunc)
00116 {

00119

00122         nli.pszCtrl                     = pszPluginName;
00123         nli.wParam                      = nbFunc;

00126         CommunicationInfo       ci;

00152 static BOOL NLChangeMenu(HINSTANCE hInst, HWND hNpp, HMENU hMenu, LPCTSTR pszMenu, UINT mf_ByComPos)
00153 {
00154         TCHAR           szPath[MAX_PATH];
00155         ::GetModuleFileName((HMODULE)hInst, szPath, MAX_PATH);
00156 
00157         tNatLangInfo            nli;
00158         nli.hCtrl                       = hMenu;
00159         nli.pszCtrl                     = pszMenu;
00160         nli.lRes                        = 0;
00161         nli.wParam                      = mf_ByComPos;
00162 
00163         CommunicationInfo       ci;
00164         ci.srcModuleName        = PathFindFileName(szPath);
00165         ci.internalMsg          = NPP_NATLANG_CHANGEMENU;
00166         ci.info                         = &nli;
00167         ::SendMessage(hNpp, NPPM_MSGTOPLUGIN, (WPARAM)NATIVE_LANG_NAME, (LPARAM)&ci);
00168 
00169         return nli.lRes;

00257 static UINT NLGetText(HINSTANCE hInst, HWND hNpp, LPCTSTR pszKey, LPTSTR pszText, UINT length)
00258 {
00259         TCHAR           szPath[MAX_PATH];
00260         ::GetModuleFileName((HMODULE)hInst, szPath, MAX_PATH);
00261 
00262         tNatLangInfo            nli;
00263         nli.hCtrl                       = NULL;
00264         nli.pszCtrl                     = pszKey;
00265         nli.lRes                        = 0;
00266         nli.wParam                      = length;
00267         nli.lParam                      = (LPARAM)&pszText;
00268 
00269         CommunicationInfo       ci;
00270         ci.srcModuleName        = PathFindFileName(szPath);
00271         ci.internalMsg          = NPP_NATLANG_GETTEXT;
00272         ci.info                         = &nli;
00273         ::SendMessage(hNpp, NPPM_MSGTOPLUGIN, (WPARAM)NATIVE_LANG_NAME, (LPARAM)&ci);
00274 
00275         return (UINT)nli.lRes;
00276 }

00296 static INT NLMessageBox(HINSTANCE hInst, HWND hNpp, LPCTSTR pszKey, UINT uType, HWND hDlg = NULL)
00297 {
00298         if (hDlg == NULL)
00299                 hDlg = hNpp;
00300 
00301         LPTSTR  wPtr = NULL;
00302         TCHAR   text[MAX_PATH]  = {0};
00303         if (NLGetText(hInst, hNpp, pszKey, text, MAX_PATH)) {
00304                 wPtr = _tcstok(text, _T("\t"));
00305                 wPtr = _tcstok(NULL, _T("\t"));
00306                 return ::MessageBox(hDlg, text, wPtr, uType);
00307         }
00308         return FALSE;
00309 }
